message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $10,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and expectations. Looking forward to your positive response.
